name: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor
desc: A factory class for creating vertical layout constraint objects using a fluent API.

items.name: func constraint(equalToSystemSpacingBelow: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor, multiplier: CGFloat) -> NSLayoutConstraint
items.desc: Returns a constraint that defines the specific distance at which the current anchor is positioned below the specified anchor.

items.name: func constraint(greaterThanOrEqualToSystemSpacingBelow: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor, multiplier: CGFloat) -> NSLayoutConstraint
items.desc: Returns a constraint that defines the minimum distance by which the current anchor is positioned below the specified anchor.

items.name: func constraint(lessThanOrEqualToSystemSpacingBelow: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor, multiplier: CGFloat) -> NSLayoutConstraint
items.desc: Returns a constraint that defines the maximum distance by which the current anchor is positioned below the specified anchor.

items.name: func anchorWithOffset(to: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor) -> NSLayoutDimension
items.desc: Creates a layout dimension object from two anchors.
